p: Though we do not expect a correlation between temperature and seasonality with Î” leaf values, nor are there good proxies for these variables in the fossil record, we include them here for completeness. This ensures that any observed noise is random or unaccountable for in the fossil record, rather than related to variables that are commonly measured and potentially relevant in plant isotope discrimination ( Farquhar, Ehleringer & Hubick, 1989; Arens, Jahren & Amundson, 2000).
